data.actual_result: if a Discord link is between <> the invite embed will be escaped, while it shows on Desktop (I noticed that in the #discord-resources channel of DFeedback there is no embed at all)
data.expected_result: <> is intended for escaping external website embeds, not invite embeds
data.short_description: Wrapping invite links into <> will escape the invite embeds
data.steps_to_repro: - Paste a Discord server invite link - Wrap it between <>
